result.success: Noted! Your ID: '<'code'>'{fingerprint}'<'/code'>'. Now '<'a href='{href}''>'go to the same page'<'/a'>' from inkognito mode.
result.guess: Well, I presume, your favorite pr0n is '<'code'>'{prevMessage}'<'/code'>' (you filthy bastard), and your ID is '<'code'>'{fingerprint}'<'/code'>'.

description: This is a part of my post about how corporations gather data about us even if we don't know nothing about it. It's a very small and simple demo. The idea is that you visit a porn-site as a thing you're most ashamed of with inkognito mode on. You're a bit of a hacker yourself, aren't you?
This demo will show you how silly of you it is to think that rich powerful and smart corporations cannot deduce your ID if you use inkognito more. Go ahead!

appDb.title: Apps that respect your data
appDb.main: Main idea is to create a list of apps that, to my opinion, respect users' data. The requirements are listed {tagO}in this post{tagC}. I'm in the middle of the process right now. While you wait please subscribe for my newsletter, then you'll get the content even faster.

consoleWarning: Hi there, anonymous hacker! We hire THE BEST janitors our there, and you seem to fit our team! Drop a few lines to trash@bin.com

feedback.pNew: If we missed some really cool story on data leaks, please '<'a rel='noreferrer noopener' target='_blank' href="{link}"'>'write us an email'<'/a'>'. Important: we're not publishing stories without valid sources.
feedback.pOld: You can send any corrections and additions to this article '<'a rel='noreferrer noopener' target='_blank' href="{link}"'>'on my email'<'/a'>', I'll surely review them.
feedback.newStoryBody:
What is it about in two words: 

Source:

disclosure.header: This article is about a data leak
disclosure.personalP: Typically corporations are not obligated to disclose information about all the data that leaked, but only personal users' data.
disclosure.tableP: But we understand that company's valuable aggregated data is stored, most of the time, in the same database as users' data. If one was leaked, we presume the other was as well.

leaks.emailText: Subscribe to get these stories in your inbox from time to time. Pinky swear: I won't sell you out.
